DISCORD_BOT_TOKEN: (Optional) Discord Bot Token of notifier bot
DISCORD_USER_ID: (Optional) Discord User ID of user to notify
INTERVAL: Interval of checking the store in seconds (default: 60s)
ITEM_URL: URL of item to check for in the online shop
NOTIFICATION_METHOD: File name (w/o .py) of the notification method to employ (select from 'notificationMethods' folder; default: 'alert')
STORE: File name (w/o .py) of the store script to import (select from 'stores' folder)
USER_AGENT: Request header's user agent (search online 'what is my user agent?')
